Text: hi jonny, i saw your comment on aoloffline chd release of chocolat 2000 and be able to find only dead sinners release, just to have in mind to reupload... cheers!
@kustone - Sinners' release of Chocolat is from the same 2009 source. I don't know if the 2011 blu-ray is better or not, and I also can't find an encode from it.
ok, thanks for quick response, i will go with chd for now.
